about_the_game:
Trapped in a mysterious dungeon with no way out, two unlikely survivors must work together to navigate a series of deadly puzzles, evade sinister traps, and prove their worth. Trials of Belphegor blends brain-teasing challenges with pixel-perfect movement, drawing inspiration from the classic flash game Bloxorz while introducing unique character dynamics and an immersive fantasy setting.

Key Features:

🧩 Escape Room Mode – A puzzle-focused experience where each solved challenge brings you one step closer to freedom.

🏰 Tower Mode – The ultimate test of skill and strategy. With limited lives, failure means restarting from the beginning.

⚔️ Challenge Mode – Face a series of intricate puzzles designed to push your problem-solving abilities to their limits.
💀 Deadly Traps and Brain-Teasing Challenges – Every step could be your last. Plan your moves carefully to avoid falling victim to the dungeon’s dangers.

🏆 Leaderboards & Competitive Play – Compete for the top spot in Tower Mode and Casual Mode, proving your skills against players worldwide.

Wishlist Now & Prove Your Worth!
